actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks. Hearings held. Hearings printed: S.Hrg. 103-837.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks and Forests

official_title: A bill to provide for a feasibility study of including Revere Beach in the National Park System.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior to study and report to specified congressional committees on potential means to preserve and interpret Revere Beach, Massachusetts, including recommendations on the feasibility of establishing it as a unit of the National Park System. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: A bill to provide for a feasibility study of including Revere Beach in the National Park System.
